Container.Name: ByteStash
Container.Project: Code snippet manager for storing and organising code snippets
Container.Overview: ByteStash is a web-based application for managing and organising code snippets with a clean, modern interface. Features include syntax highlighting, categorisation, a full-fledged code editor.

Config.Name: Web Interface Port
Config.Description: Port for web interface. Change the left number if you want to use a different port to access the interface.

Config.Name: Snippets Directory
Config.Description: Directory where code snippets will be stored
